markdownRemark.excerpt: I think it was around 11:30pm in the night and I was sure about receiving a mail from google anytime soon, will I be accepted or rejected? I was so nervous that…
markdownRemark.html:
I think it was around 11:30pm in the night and I was sure about receiving a mail from google anytime soon, will I be accepted or rejected? I was so nervous that I was thinking of going to sleep and maybe check it in the morning!

Then a thought about respecting the efforts I had put in came, “I’m not gonna insult my hard work by hiding from the result!”

When I read the email stating me as an accepted student!! my heart started beating so fast I could literally hear it ( after so long xD ), anyways when even after some time it didn’t stop, I seriously thought it was going to burst LMAO, so I plugged in my earphones and played a song that I came across that very same day itself and tried sleeping :P

BTW in case if you are wondering, Famy - Ava is that song!

Here I go again! this blog was supposed to be technical.
:P To give it some technical context, here is the technical summary of my project . I will dedicate a special post to Pitivi and my Journey of discovering and working with this wonderful Organization!!!!

frontmatter.title: Into GSoC'20 | Pitivi
frontmatter.description: The mail of Happiness and Opportunity!
